page.title: 05ST GEORGE'S HALL BRADFORD
page.content:
Designed by Lockwood & Mawson, this large {concert hall}was built in 1853. The style is classic revival with Corinthian pilasters and round headed windows. Full refurbishing of the building took place recently and it now operates a computerised booking system.
Subscription concerts by the {Manchester Halle Orchestra}take place annually. Various jazz and pop concerts take place during the year, as well as visits from foreign entertainers and shows featuring current well-known variety artistes.
The Hall is also used for occasional trade exhibitions and also wrestling contests.
